basics.name: Tom Bremer
basics.label: UX Developer, Software Engineer
basics.summary: User Experience and Interaction Developern. Sass evangelist, Open Source advocate, Fine Arts Background. ['vinyl', 'coffee', 'beer'] nerd

work.summary: User Experience developer, A/B Test Engineer, UX Tech Stack
highlights: Integral in a full site redesign
Created CSS and SASS based solutions to elemenate reliance on Javascript DOM manipulations and animations
Development and support of code styleguide
Development of modern workflow utilizing GruntJS
Writing a new framework / pattern library for UX and Backend developers
A large array of user expierence tests with content varience
Standing up new domains for long term tests

work.summary: Micro blogging platform leveraging NodeJS, SASS, HTML 5, nginx and MongoDB. The goal is to create a transportable application that can serve as both the front and back end of my personal website. I am utilizing a GruntJS build process, Mocha/Should unit tests and MongoDB as the datstore. For the front end we again are using GruntJS to watch and compile files, also Twitter's FlightJS framework for DOM processing.
highlights: Twitter FlightJS Framework for front end JS DOM Manipulation / User Interactions

awards.title: Outstanding Contributor
awards.summary: For contributions on the site wide redesign as well as the A/B Testing team
